modName: Witcher 2 - Blue Stripes Commando Hood Maskless
summary: A maskless version of the Blue Stripes hood from TH3WICK3D1\'s Blue Stripes Commando mod (The Witcher 2).
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This is my first mod. It\'s a very simple mod which replaces the Blue Stripes Commando hood from TH3WICK3D1\'s mod with a maskless version. I know it ain\'t a huge deal but I just recently learned the basics of modding myself so I thought I\'d throw something up here. Enjoy.
 

Requirements:
You must have TH3WICK3D1\'s Blue Stripes Commando mod installed first, it can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7807



Installation:
Just extract the files to your main Skyrim directory.


Credits:
I did not create or port any of the textures I used in this mod. Credit for that should go too: 
- TH3WICK3D1: For porting these textures into Skyrim in the first place. He did all the hard work, this is just merely an alteration of his awesome mod.
- CD Projekt RED: The creators of game The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings from which these models were ported.
author: SpartanXIII90
